title: Natchez National Historical Park: News
body: News       Social Media Natchez National Historical Park is using several Social Media sites in order to reach out to our visitors and continue the conversation. These sites can be used before, during and after a trip to Natchez National Historical Park to provide historical information about the sites and current information about park facilities.         Facebook Natchez National Historical Park uses Facebook to continue the conversation with our visitors. On our page you can view historic and current images, learn about he people and stories of the park, and keep up to date with the latest happenings at Natchez National Historical Park.         Twitter Natchez National Historical Park uses Twitter to provide visitors with the most up-to-date information about the park. Information includes historical events, visitation information, and even pictures. Mention us to join the conversation and talk about your experiences at Natchez National Historical Park, ask questions, or share pictures
